Major_Arcs.title: Introduction to Nan and the Ghost Town Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Nan, Cal, and the central conflict surrounding the ghost town and its impending modernization.

sub_scenes.title: Initial Reluctance and Romantic Rejection
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Nan's stubborn character and her initial rejection of Cal's romantic advances, setting up her disinterest in the ghost town.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction to Ghost Town and the Stubborn Woman

sub_scenes.title: Shift to Modernity and the Airport Announcement
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene transitions from the personal conflict to the broader issue of modernization, revealing the plan to build an airport on the ghost town site.

narrative_arcs.title: Nan's Reflections on the Ghost Town
Disbelief, Explanation, and Nan's Emotional Reaction to Ghost Town Demolition

Major_Arcs.title: Nan's Emotional Turmoil and Reconciliation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Nan's emotional journey from initial distress to reconciliation with Cal and eventual confrontation with the ghost town's destruction.

sub_scenes.title: Reconciliation and Approaching Ghost Town
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Nan and Cal's reconciliation and Nan's journey towards the ghost town, now aware of its impending demolition.

narrative_arcs.title: Nan's Arrival at the Transformed Ghost Town and Dismay

sub_scenes.title: Family Conflict and Emotional Breakdown
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Nan's confrontation with her father, highlighting their differing views on business versus personal values and leading to Nan's emotional breakdown.

sub_scenes.title: Seeking Guidance and Deciding to Act
sub_scenes.description: In this sub-scene, Nan seeks comfort and advice from her mother and maid, leading to a shift from despair to resolve and a decision to confront Cal.

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Confession and Impulsive Actions
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Nan and Cal's evolving relationship, Nan's confession, and her impulsive reactions amidst the backdrop of forced labor and developing feelings.

sub_scenes.title: Forced Labor and Defiance
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Nan's resistance to being forced to help with the horses, setting up her defiant attitude and unwillingness to comply with her father's demands.

narrative_arcs.title: Yore Dad's Deal and No Backing Down

sub_scenes.title: Confession and Impulsive Horse Wrangling
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Nan finally confessing her feelings to Cal, followed by an impulsive act of driving away the horses, highlighting her emotional complexity and actions.

Major_Arcs.title: Weather Crisis and Community Spirit
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts the focus to an external crisis - a severe snowstorm - and the community's response, highlighting both personal tensions and collective resilience.

sub_scenes.title: Accusations and Initial Weather Concerns
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene begins with unresolved personal tensions between Nan and Cal, quickly transitioning to the looming threat of a severe weather event.

narrative_arcs.title: Accusations and Defensiveness in the Snow
Seeking Comfort and Hope Amidst the Storm

sub_scenes.title: Despair and Unexpected Relief
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene captures the initial despair caused by the relentless snowfall, followed by the unexpected arrival of aid in the form of 'Operation Hay Lift'.

narrative_arcs.title: Waking Up to Snow and Hopelessness
The Sound of a Plane and Hopeful Fodder Drop
Joyful Recognition of Fodder and Cal's Foresight

Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of Chane Benson and Town Dynamics
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new character, Chane Benson, and sets up a new narrative thread focusing on town dynamics, reputation, and emerging conflicts.

sub_scenes.title: Chane Benson's Arrival and Public Reaction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Chane Benson's dramatic entrance into the town and the varied reactions from the townspeople, establishing his impactful presence.

sub_scenes.title: Jeff's Character and Sally's Concerns
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts focus to Jeff and Sally, introducing Jeff's character, his admiration for his brother, and Sally's worries about his path.

narrative_arcs.title: Reflecting on Jeff's Brother and Past

sub_scenes.title: Sally's Plea and Clyde's Reassurance
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Sally's deep concern for Jeff's trajectory and her plea to Clyde for help, followed by Clyde's reassurance and their shared determination.

narrative_arcs.title: Sally's Fear and Plea to Clyde

Major_Arcs.title: Newspaper Article and Escalating Town Conflicts
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a newspaper article as a catalyst for town tensions, focusing on warnings, accusations, and the growing conflict involving Clyde, Sally, and Benson.

sub_scenes.title: Article's Fallout and Warnings for Clyde
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the town's reaction to a newspaper article, with warnings being issued to Clyde about Benson and the article's potential impact.

narrative_arcs.title: Defense of Past Actions and Article Mention
Warning about Benson and the Article

sub_scenes.title: Dinner Invitation and Mistaken Identity
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene includes Benson's justification for his actions, the article's impact on Jeff, and Sally's unexpected dinner invitation, leading to a confrontation and mistaken identity.

narrative_arcs.title: Article's Impact and Doubts about Clyde

Major_Arcs.title: Jealousy, Confrontation, and Rescue Mission
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the escalating conflict due to mistaken identity, jealousy-driven actions, and Sally and Jeff's urgent mission to save Clyde.

sub_scenes.title: Jealousy and Physical Altercation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Jeff's jealousy leading to a physical fight with Chane Benson, and Sally's enraged reaction to the scene.

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and Family Legacy
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the resolution of the conflict with Chane Benson, the changing of the headline, and the establishment of a family legacy in journalism.

narrative_arcs.title: Challenge for a Fair Fight and Anxious Wait
Printing the Clarion and Family Legacy

Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of Steve Daley and Range War Tensions
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to a new storyline introducing Steve Daley and setting up tensions related to range wars and ranch management.

sub_scenes.title: Establishing Authority and Impending Trouble
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Steve Daley and the initial signs of trouble brewing at Betsy's ranch, setting up potential conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of Steve Daley as 'The Boss'
Discussion of Betsy's Ranch and Approaching Trouble

sub_scenes.title: Range War Concerns and Ride to Town
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene further develops the range war tensions and shows the initial interaction between Steve Daley and the woman, leading to their ride to town.

narrative_arcs.title: Clarifying Steve Daley's Role and Concerns
Discussion of Impending Range War and Local Troubles
Offer of a Ride and Acceptance
Hank's Orders and Waiting for Dress Material

Major_Arcs.title: Town Confrontation and Betsy's Decisions
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on events in town, including a confrontation and Betsy's strategic decisions regarding ranch management and personnel.

sub_scenes.title: Town Visit and Physical Conflict
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Betsy's arrival in town and a physical confrontation, highlighting rising tensions and Steve Daley's capabilities.

narrative_arcs.title: Post-Purchase Conversation and Steve Daley Mention
Discussion of Steve Daley's Abilities and Impending Danger

sub_scenes.title: Strategic Ranch Management and Hiring
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Betsy's decision to hire Steve Daley as a bodyguard and her broader philosophy regarding ranch management and personnel, despite her aversion to gunslingers.

narrative_arcs.title: Decision to Hire Bodyguard and Ranch Philosophy
Clarification on Firing and Stance Against Gunslingers
Gratitude, Personnel Change, and Hank Yuh's Request

Major_Arcs.title: Love, Guns, and Resolution at Devil's Pass
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc develops the romantic relationship between Betsy and Steve, focusing on their conflict over guns, mutual confessions of love, and the resolution of external conflict at Devil's Pass.

sub_scenes.title: Gun Ultimatum and Emotional Confession
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Betsy's ultimatum to Steve regarding his guns and their subsequent emotional confessions of love, setting up a central romantic conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Love's Proof and Surrender of Guns

sub_scenes.title: Escalating Conflict and Devil's Pass Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene portrays the escalation of external conflict leading to Hank's ambush and capture, culminating in the resolution at Devil's Pass and Betsy and Steve's reunion.

narrative_arcs.title: Declaration of War and Betsy's Authority
Aftermath and Suspense at Devil's Pass

Major_Arcs.title: The Story of Carrie, Fred, and Dave - Deception and Reconciliation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc tells the story of Carrie, Fred, and Dave, focusing on themes of love, deception, and eventual reconciliation amidst business conflicts.

sub_scenes.title: Initial Confrontation and Curley's Actions
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Mary's confrontation with Dave and her concern about Curley's unusual behavior, setting up initial tensions.

sub_scenes.title: Fence Dispute and Escalating Tension
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts a dispute over a fence, leading to a confrontation with Fred Gordon and escalating tensions with the threat of violence.

narrative_arcs.title: Unexpected Visitors and Accusation of Fence Damage

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Interlude and Betrayal Revelation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts from conflict to a romantic interlude between Carrie and Dave, which is abruptly interrupted, leading to Carrie's realization of Fred's deception.

narrative_arcs.title: Confusion about Friendship and Second Chances
Romantic Interlude and Dismissal of Conflict
Confession of Love for Fred Gordon
Desire to Bury the Hatchet and Romantic Overture
Flashback to Romantic Words and Proposal
Discussion about Dave and the Carlton Contract
Arrival and Confrontation at Carlton's Office
Apology and Inquiry about Feelings for Fred
Wagon Ride and Direct Confrontation about Love
The Beef Contract Revelation and Reconciliation with Fred

Major_Arcs.title: Dirk's Wound, Pursuit, and Moral Dilemma
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts focus to Dirk's storyline, depicting his injury, the secret meeting with Carrie, the pursuit by the Marshal, and the resulting moral dilemma.

sub_scenes.title: Dirk's Urgent Plea and Secret Meeting
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Dirk's urgent plea to Carrie and their secret rendezvous, revealing his gunshot wound.

narrative_arcs.title: Dirk's Urgent Arrival and Plea for Help
The Secret Meeting and Dirk's Disguise
Dirk's Gunshot Wound and Medical Examination

sub_scenes.title: Investigation and Marshal Ransom's Arrival
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the investigation into Dirk's situation and the arrival of Marshal Ransom at the ranch, initiating the pursuit.

narrative_arcs.title: Concern and Investigation into Dirk's Situation
Marshal Ransom's Arrival and Inquiry about Dirk
Confrontation with Rance Cready and Suspicion at the Ranch

sub_scenes.title: Pursuit and Moral Choice
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene portrays Marshal Ransom's confrontation with Dirk, the ensuing gunfight, Chris's injury, and the moral dilemma of whether to kill the injured Marshal.

narrative_arcs.title: Escape Plan Proposal and Seeming Agreement

Major_Arcs.title: Resolution and Romantic Climax
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc brings the story to a close, focusing on Chris and Ransom's romantic resolution, Dirk's escape, and their wedding day.

sub_scenes.title: Escape Facilitation and Reunion
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Chris facilitating Dirk's escape, her unexpected return to Ransom, and their emotional reunion.

sub_scenes.title: Recovery, Confession, and Wedding Day
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Ransom's recovery, Chris's confession of love, their engagement, and the anticipation of their wedding day, culminating in Dirk's dramatic interruption.
